attributes.action: Use the HIPS resources to re-assess council tax bands
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the fall in house sales, it would be opportune to perform the re-evaluation of council tax bands using the trained resource available.

This action would provide several benefits:

Encourage house moves rather than extensions (which are exempt from council tax band changes).

Re-establish a fair system where houses with large extensions would be taxed in the correct band.

Release more houses into the market palce
